title: Marauder Ashe Feet

embed.description: Full animated 3D models for LoL champion Marauder Ashe, try all of the skins!

body: Check out her feet in the lolking model viewer link, anatomically you would call that dorsiflexion (toes pointing up). Seems like an easy enough fix.

replies.body: Not that the toes are pointed. Its as if she is walking on her heels.

Thick armor =/= your toes. 

Laws of physics deems that thick armor overrules skin under layers.

> [{quoted}](name=Aeror,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=H2UVRn32,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-18T12:52:42.282+0000)
>
> Thick armor =/= your toes. 
> 
> Laws of physics deems that thick armor overrules skin under layers.

What does that have to do with physics?
